title: Story of outspoken women's rights advocate captured in 'Seeing Allred'
text:
Story of outspoken women's rights advocate captured in 'Seeing Allred' 1:34am GMT - 01:50 
''Seeing Allred'' is a documentary focusing on the life and career of the women's rights lawyer Gloria Allred. It's coming out at a time where her views which were seen as outspoken in the past have now ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
"Seeing Allred" is a documentary focusing on the life and career of the women's rights lawyer Gloria Allred. It's coming out at a time where her views which were seen as outspoken in the past have now Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2ExV01V
